sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_45684debc36282105670564ed4013150
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AskGeminiAIUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This script include is created for the Application - "Ask Gemini AI" to integrate ServiceNow with Google Gemini AI.</description><name>AskGeminiAIUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var AskGeminiAIUtils = Class.create();
AskGeminiAIUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    //Calling the function through the UI Action - 'Ask Gemini AI' on the table 'Ask GeminiAI'
    helpUserAskGeminiAI: function() {
		//Fetching the question from the UI Action
        var questionForAI = this.getParameter('sysparm_questionForAI');
		
		//Framing the suitable question prompt for Gemini
        var content = "I want to know about the following question: ";
        if (questionForAI) {
            content += "Question: " + questionForAI + "? ";
        }
        content += "Please provide precise explanations in multiple paragraphs and number points";

		//Retrieving answer from Gemini
        var geminiResponse = this.getResponse(content);
        if (geminiResponse) {
            return geminiResponse;
        } else {
			// Gemini Response Invalid Question
            return "I didn't understand your question. Please rephrase it for me once again.";
        }
    },
	//Utilizing Outbound REST Message
    getResponse: function(content) {

        var answer = undefined;
        try {
			//Providing parameteers for Gemini
            var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('GeminiAI', 'GeminiAIPost');
            restMessage.setStringParameterNoEscape('prompt', content);
            restMessage.setStringParameterNoEscape('max_tokens', 400);
            restMessage.setStringParameterNoEscape('temperature', 0);

			//Collecting Response from Gemini
            var response = restMessage.execute();
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            gs.info("Question: " + content);
            gs.info("GeminiAI Response: " + JSON.stringify(responseBody));
            var http_statusCode = response.getStatusCode();
            gs.info("GeminiAI Request Status Code: " + http_statusCode);
			//Parsing JSON response to extract the answer
            var responseObj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            if (http_statusCode == 200) {
                answer = responseObj.candidates[0].content.parts[0].text;
            }

        } catch (ex) {
            var message = ex.message;
        }
        return answer;
    },
    type: 'AskGeminiAIUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-08 13:22:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>45684debc36282105670564ed4013150</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AskGeminiAIUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_45684debc36282105670564ed4013150</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-10 05:50:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
